name: Alan teaches: Typing and Spelling
description:
READ THIS FIRST:

I know that it's too late for a Baldi's Basics clone or fan game. Also I recommend you to give this at least a try it may like you.

Description:

This game is a Baldi's Basics clone that contains some similar gameplay and graphics but some mechanics are kinda similar but with some extra things.
Also this game was made in like 2 months or something like that, it may contain some bugs that may ruin the expirience but their gonna be fixed in the next update.

Remember give Feedback that helps ALOT thanks! Also if you find bugs report and if you can give details like what version of the game you are playing or something like that.

Also the game is kinda hard but if you love challanges you should definitely give this a try!

Story:

Hello! Welcome to Alan's School. Here you can entertain with your Ƒ̶̢̩̦̘̟͊́̔̈́̕͘͠͠Ǐ̷̢̘̊́͑̍͛̂̃͂̄̈́̂͌̇̃̊͝͝͝͝Ǐ̵̧̺̝̩̙̳̰̤̤̺͖̳̥̩̞̲̲̒̾̐̂͂̒͆̀͒̇̓͐͗̇̔̄̊̀̚̚͝Ȅ̷̡͚̗̘͓̗̘̞̦͙̰͉͚̖͍̟̜̘̚͠ǹ̷̛͈̣͔̂̈́̾͒̿̆͂̉̀̌͐̽͘͝͝͠Ɖ̵͇̆̿̎̊͑̏̆͛͊̑̓ȿ̵̢̛̦̙͉͖̜͍͗͊̑̐͆̽͒͂̈͆͝͝... Every day here is a smile and lauhgs, If you have any question ask it to Alan, he is an person with so much imagination and amazing ideas.  ̵̧͕̼͍̆͂ ̷͎̫̮͎̝͌̋̿͒͒ ̴͈̲͗̕͠ ̷͇̇̌̈́ ̴̧͙̼̼́̽ͅ ̵͈̦̭̤̓̉̿̕ ̸͇̏͋̆̉̀ ̴̟̮̊ ̸͓̇́̒͗͜ ̸̩̪̑̆ ̸̧̛̗͙̯͍̆͆̊̌ ̵̬̞̪̺͗̏͆̋ ̴̥̲̗̾&̷̧̥̟̯̖͑́́͌ ̸̯̙̈́̎́͑͝҉̸̰͈̔̈́҉̵̳̂̔̽҉̶̡̮͉̪͓̅̚͠҉̷̧̜̣̓̉͗̈́̆͜҉̸̧̖̟̣̄̾̊ Also here we have multiple teachers like math, geometry, history and all of that stuff! Now you only need to think about all you reed. We are fun!  ȃ̸̼̞̣͒̾̇̆ͅṇ̶̛̤̭̅̌̋d̷̤̹̾̒͜ ̵̨̺͍̀y̷̤̩͙̭̠͒̈́̃̽̓o̴̦͙̎̂͌̿u̸̟̎͌̇̏̓ ̵̡̗̓͆̍͛w̸̺̎͘i̵̢̤̲̎̅ḻ̸̣̼̦̊l̶̹͓̟̼̓̄̋͆̕ ̵̨̤̟̬͎̿̇͌s̶͕͐̏͝e̶̳̗̫̘̿͐̾͜e̶̡̱̥̅̊͘ ̵̥͚̮̯̜̇͋͛́͝s̵̬̮͚̖̈́͒̔͘c̷͓̹̥̋͊͛̊̚ṛ̶̢̺͔̲̓e̷̡̛̤̳̓͌̕͝ą̶̘̮̤͒͆́͆̕m̸͈̌̀̍̾̕ï̷̯̓̐ṅ̵̨͌̋͋̓g̴̝͖̯̾̊̍͋͠ ̵̘̎͂͊p̵̰͉͓͚͒͆̈́̚͝ē̶̦͒̾a̸̲̬͚͋͋͗p̷̪̬͔̑̏͝o̴͕̓͛̐͜l̶̡̹̱̰͋͑͛͝ͅë̴̬́̿ ̸̡̢̥̱̩̈́͛̈́̋̀t̶̼͙̻͎̍̊́̃r̶̨̡̹͍͐́̀a̴̠͋ͅp̴̢͈͓̼͒̉̓̏͘ṕ̶̨̛̤͓̖͖e̵̢͒̐̏͝d̵̨̗̲̬̿̈́͜ ̵͕͓͖̕î̸͕͋n̴͚̰̦̊̋̀͝s̵̳̹͋̕ȉ̸̧̆̉d̷̦̜̝͛̽́̓è̵͖̌͌ ̸̧͉̲͈͑̊̎͝ͅà̸̡͎̝̃͌̕n̷͕͙̳̭̆́̈̃͒ḑ̵͉̹͉͔̑͘ ̷̞̙̻͕̓̐̊̉s̶̲̈́͛̈̄͝ü̴̥͎̞͛̅̍͝f̷̮̰̼͖̔̃̀͠f̸͉̟̟͝ȩ̸͕͖͍͛̉̚͝͝r̶̤̪̤̖̋͘͜i̴̳̼͒͋͑̓n̸̡͙̼̪͍̒̕g̵̙̤͊̑͜ ̶̧̛̖͕̉̓̊͘e̵̡̻̅̒v̷͓͙̖͙̋̀͘̚e̵̛̲̙͛r̷͈͕̍̂̀̽y̷̡̛̮̥̟̋ ̷̘̬͍͑̈́̽d̶̞̘̖͗a̵̩̳͖̹̫̅́̾̓y̸̪̜̼̋.̷̳̫̦̓̕͝.̵̡̣̘͒̏͑̕.̸̏ͅ.̷̞̞̈́.̵͓̣̪̉̑̎..............
